target.name: clean
target.depends: clean.module.emailer, clean.module.main, clean.module.problemsnapshotinserter, clean.module.servletframework, clean.module.woserver, clean.artifact.woserver:war_exploded, clean.artifact.woserver:webforlocalhost_exploded, clean.artifact.woserver:webforrose_beta_exploded, clean.artifact.woserver:webforrose_production_exploded, clean.artifact.woserver:webforsugaree_exploded

target.name: build.modules
target.depends: init, clean, compile.module.emailer, compile.module.main, compile.module.problemsnapshotinserter, compile.module.servletframework, compile.module.woserver

target.name: clean.artifact.woserver:webforrose_beta_exploded
target.description: clean woServer:WebForRose BETA exploded artifact output

target.name: clean.artifact.woserver:webforrose_production_exploded
target.description: clean woServer:WebForRose PRODUCTION exploded artifact output

target.name: build.all.artifacts
target.depends: artifact.emailer:jar, artifact.problemsnapshotinserter:jar, artifact.servletframework:jar, artifact.war_rose_beta, artifact.war_rose_production, artifact.woserver_war_sugaree, artifact.woserver:war, artifact.woserver:war_exploded, artifact.woserver:webforlocalhost_exploded, artifact.woserver:webforrose_beta_exploded, artifact.woserver:webforrose_production_exploded, artifact.woserver:webforsugaree_exploded
